Klasse GameService

java.lang.Object
util.GameService
public class GameService extends Object
Service class responsible for managing game state synchronization and polling.

  • Konstruktorübersicht

    Konstruktoren
    Konstruktor
    Beschreibung
    GameService(Spielverwaltung game, String localPlayer, String roomName)
    Initializes the service with game API, player information, and starts automatic polling for game state updates.

  • Konstruktordetails

    • GameService

      public GameService(Spielverwaltung game, String localPlayer, String roomName)
      Initializes the service with game API, player information, and starts automatic polling for game state updates.
      Parameter:
      game - the remote game management interface.
      localPlayer - the name of the local player.
      roomName - the name of the game room.

  • Methodendetails

    • getLocalPlayer

      public PlayerModel getLocalPlayer()
      Gets the PlayerModel for the local player.
      Gibt zurück:
      the PlayerModel representing the current user

    • getPlayerModel

      public PlayerModel getPlayerModel(String playerName)
      Gets the PlayerModel for a specific player by name.
      Parameter:
      playerName - the name of the player
      Gibt zurück:
      the PlayerModel for the specified player, or null if not found

    • updateStichFromDTO

      public void updateStichFromDTO(StichDTO dto)
      Updates the local trick model based on data from the server.
      Parameter:
      dto - the StichDTO containing current trick state from server.

    • clearStich

      public void clearStich()
      Clears all cards from the current trick.

    • updatePlayersFromGameState

      public void updatePlayersFromGameState(GameStateDTO gameStateDTO)
      Updates all player models based on the current game state from the server.
      Parameter:
      gameStateDTO - the current game state data from the server

    • initPlayerModels

      public void initPlayerModels(GameStateDTO dto)
      Initializes player models from the initial game state.
      Parameter:
      dto - the initial game state containing player information

    • endGameOthers

      public void endGameOthers() throws IOException
      Ends the game for other players (non-host).
      Löst aus:
      IOException - if there's an error during scene switching.

    • endGame

      public void endGame() throws Exception
      Ends the game for the host player.
      Löst aus:
      Exception - if there's an error during game cleanup or scene switching.

    • shutdown

      public void shutdown()
      Shuts down the polling service and stops all background tasks.

    • getPlayerModels

      public Map<String, PlayerModel> getPlayerModels()
      Gets the map of all player models.
      Gibt zurück:
      map containing all PlayerModel instances indexed by player name.

    • getGame

      public Spielverwaltung getGame()
      Gets the remote game management interface.
      Gibt zurück:
      the Spielverwaltung instance used for server communication

    • getStich

      public StichModel getStich()
      Gets the current trick model.
      Gibt zurück:
      the StichModel representing the current trick state

    • setGameBoardController

      public void setGameBoardController(GameBoardController gameBoardController)
      Sets the game board controller reference.
      Parameter:
      gameBoardController - the GameBoardController instance to use for UI operations
